scripts.build: npm run babel-build && npm run docker-build
scripts.babel-build: npm run clean && babel src -d lib --source-maps
scripts.babel-build-inline-sourcemaps: npm run clean && babel src -d lib --source-maps inline
scripts.docker: npm run babel-build && npm run docker-run-develop
scripts.docker-run: docker run -e DEBUG=$DEBUG -it --rm -p 8080:8080 --name <%= name %>-1 <%= name %> npm start
scripts.docker-run-detached: docker run -e DEBUG=$DEBUG -t -d -p 8080:8080 --name <%= name %>-1 <%= name %> npm start
scripts.docker-run-debug: docker run -e DEBUG=$npm_package_config_DEBUG -it --rm -p 8080:8080 --name <%= name %>-1 <%= name %> npm run debug
scripts.docker-run-develop: docker run -e DEBUG=$npm_package_config_DEBUG -it --rm -v $PWD:/usr/src/app -p 8080:8080 --name <%= name %>-1 <%= name %> npm run debug
scripts.docker-run-mounted: docker run -e DEBUG=$npm_package_config_DEBUG -it --rm -v $PWD:/usr/src/app -p 8080:8080 --name <%= name %>-1 <%= name %> npm start
